betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Congratuations on your first EBF!

Throughout your GTNH gameplay you will end up creating hundreds of multiblocks, and will very likely run into a multitude of power failures at some point. 

Fortunately, we have a dedicated system for helping you stay informed of exactly when and where these power failures occur §3(though the 'why' portion is up to you to figure out!)§r.

When a multiblock powerfails, you will receive a notification in §5chat§r, in addition to a visible icon on §5screen§r, and an icon visible on your §5map§r. 

§lYou can clear these notifications by§r:
- Clicking into the multiblock that has powerfailed
- Deleting the notification in JourneyMap
- Typing §4/powerfails clear§r

For those playing §2multiplayer§r, anyone who is on your §2team§r will receive the §2same notifications§r. §2§nOne person§r clearing a notification should clear it for§2 §nall players§r.

[note]This feature uses the same team system as wireless EU. Use </gt §4global_energy_join§r §1[User Joining] [User to Join]§r> to team up.[/note]

All of these features can be turned off in the gregtech config. If you want the on screen icon to disappear use §4§l/powerfails hide§r. For all in-game options use §4§l/powerfails help§r.
